Description: De-composed monocle3 functionality tools, based on https://github.com/ebi-gene-expression-group/monocle-scripts and monocle3 0.1.2.
Galaxy_tool_ids: monocle3_create, monocle3_diffExp, monocle3_learnGraph, monocle3_orderCells, monocle3_partition, monocle3_plotCells, monocle3_preprocess, monocle3_reduceDim, monocle3_topmarkers
